answers.answer: I can understand your fear but please rest assure what happened to your grandmother and mother is preventable if you pay strict attention to your dietary nutrition along with engaging in moderate exercise on a regular basis. See my reply below to the post "Lowering Blood Sugar, by AdamDon". The links posted will take you to pages of information that are valuable in helping prevent/control diabetes. You're young and taking control of your health now will benefit you and your baby in the long run.
